meanings.sent1: The louvred windows allowed a gentle breeze to enter the room.
meanings.sent2: The house had louvred shutters to control the amount of sunlight coming in.
meanings.sent3: The louvred door was so fancy, it felt like entering a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was louvred, revealing only glimpses of her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The louvred design added a touch of elegance to the otherwise plain room.

meanings.sent1: The louvred vents in the car kept the passengers cool on hot days.
meanings.sent2: The louvred blinds in the office could be adjusted for privacy.
meanings.sent3: The louvred roof of the gazebo made it look like a mini palace.
meanings.sent4: His words were louvred, revealing only what he wanted others to know.
meanings.sent5: The louvred panels on the fence added a decorative touch to the backyard.

meanings.sent1: The louvred cabinet doors allowed for proper ventilation of the dishes.
meanings.sent2: The louvred gate was both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
meanings.sent3: The louvred wardrobe seemed to have a secret compartment inside.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was louvred, hiding the sadness behind a cheerful facade.
meanings.sent5: The louvred design of the room divider created a sense of openness in the space.
